what: Access Datasets from the Rdatasets Archive
title: Access Datasets from the Rdatasets Archive
text: Rdatasets Archive language-agnostic website hosts thousands datasets CSV format. datasets can freely downloaded website (documentation), data analysis environment. present page describes package R provides simple interface search, download, view documentation datasets stored CSV Parquet formats.

title: Access Datasets from the Rdatasets Archive
text: can install development version Rdatasets GitHub :
code: remotes::install_github("vincentarelbundock/Rdatasets")  # optional dependency: faster downloads and less bandwidth install.packages("nanoparquet")

title: Access Datasets from the Rdatasets Archive
text: Use rdsearch() find datasets name, package, title:
code: library(Rdatasets) library(tinytable)  # Search all fields (default behavior) rdsearch(pattern = "iris") |> head() #>      Package Dataset                      Title Rows Cols n_binary n_character n_factor n_logical n_numeric                                                                   CSV                                                                    Doc #> 530 datasets    iris Edgar Anderson's Iris Data  150    5        0           0        1         0         4  https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/Rdatasets/csv/datasets/iris.csv  https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/Rdatasets/doc/datasets/iris.html #> 531 datasets   iris3 Edgar Anderson's Iris Data   50   12        0           0        0         0        12 https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/Rdatasets/csv/datasets/iris3.csv https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/Rdatasets/doc/datasets/iris3.html  # Case-insensitive search for datasets about the Titanic rdsearch(pattern = "(?i)TITANIC", perl = TRUE)[, 1:4] #>         Package         Dataset                                 Title Rows #> 247     carData TitanicSurvival Survival of Passengers on the Titanic 1309 #> 289  causaldata         titanic  Data from the sinking of the Titanic 2201 #> 323       COUNT         titanic                               titanic 1316 #> 324       COUNT      titanicgrp                            titanicgrp   12 #> 577    datasets         Titanic Survival of passengers on the Titanic   32 #> 2319  Stat2Data         Titanic             Passengers on the Titanic 1313 #> 2612        vcd       Lifeboats              Lifeboats on the Titanic   18 #> 2668   vcdExtra        Titanicp             Passengers on the Titanic 1309  # Search only in package names rdsearch(pattern = "ggplot2movies", field = "package")  #>            Package Dataset                                             Title  Rows Cols n_binary n_character n_factor n_logical n_numeric                                                                         CSV                                                                          Doc #> 1129 ggplot2movies  movies Movie information and user ratings from IMDB.com. 58788   24        7           2        0         0        22 https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/Rdatasets/csv/ggplot2movies/movies.csv https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/Rdatasets/doc/ggplot2movies/movies.html  # Search only in dataset names rdsearch(pattern = "iris", field = "dataset") #>      Package Dataset                      Title Rows Cols n_binary n_character n_factor n_logical n_numeric                                                                   CSV                                                                    Doc #> 530 datasets    iris Edgar Anderson's Iris Data  150    5        0           0        1         0         4  https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/Rdatasets/csv/datasets/iris.csv  https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/Rdatasets/doc/datasets/iris.html #> 531 datasets   iris3 Edgar Anderson's Iris Data   50   12        0           0        0         0        12 https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/Rdatasets/csv/datasets/iris3.csv https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/Rdatasets/doc/datasets/iris3.html  # Returns no rows rdsearch(pattern = "bad_name", field = "dataset")  #>  [1] Package     Dataset     Title       Rows        Cols        n_binary    n_character n_factor    n_logical   n_numeric   CSV         Doc         #> <0 rows> (or 0-length row.names)  # Search only in titles rdsearch(pattern = "Edgar Anderson", field = "title") #>      Package Dataset                      Title Rows Cols n_binary n_character n_factor n_logical n_numeric                                                                   CSV                                                                    Doc #> 530 datasets    iris Edgar Anderson's Iris Data  150    5        0           0        1         0         4  https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/Rdatasets/csv/datasets/iris.csv  https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/Rdatasets/doc/datasets/iris.html #> 531 datasets   iris3 Edgar Anderson's Iris Data   50   12        0           0        0         0        12 https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/Rdatasets/csv/datasets/iris3.csv https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/Rdatasets/doc/datasets/iris3.html

title: Access Datasets from the Rdatasets Archive
text: Use rddata() download load datasets:
code: # Download the famous André-Michel Guerry dataset guerry <- rddata("Guerry") head(guerry, 3) #>   rownames dept Region Department Crime_pers Crime_prop Literacy Donations Infants Suicides MainCity Wealth Commerce Clergy Crime_parents Infanticide Donation_clergy Lottery Desertion Instruction Prostitutes Distance Area Pop1831 #> 1        1    1      E        Ain      28870      15890       37      5098   33120    35039    2:Med     73       58     11            71          60              69      41        55          46          13  218.372 5762  346.03 #> 2        2    2      N      Aisne      26226       5521       51      8901   14572    12831    2:Med     22       10     82             4          82              36      38        82          24         327   65.945 7369  513.00 #> 3        3    3      C     Allier      26747       7925       13     10973   17044   114121    2:Med     61       66     68            46          42              76      66        16          85          34  161.927 7340  298.26  # Download the Titanic data from a specific package titanic <- rddata("Titanic", "Stat2Data") head(titanic, 3) #>   rownames                                Name PClass Age    Sex Survived SexCode #> 1        1        Allen, Miss Elisabeth Walton    1st  29 female        1       1 #> 2        2         Allison, Miss Helen Loraine    1st   2 female        0       1 #> 3        3 Allison, Mr Hudson Joshua Creighton    1st  30   male        0       0

what: rdindex() Browse the full dataset index
title: Access Datasets from the Rdatasets Archive

title: Access Datasets from the Rdatasets Archive
text: Use rddocs() open dataset documentation browser:
code: # Open documentation for the iris dataset rddocs("iris", "datasets")  # Automatic package detection works here too rddocs("mtcars")

title: Access Datasets from the Rdatasets Archive
text: Caching: functions cache results default speed repeated access reduce server load Parquet support: nanoparquet installed, datasets downloaded Parquet format (faster, smaller) CSV fallback: Automatically falls back CSV format nanoparquet available can disable caching behavior: Note: Please keep caching enabled (TRUE) makes repeated access faster avoids overloading Rdatasets server.

title: Access Datasets from the Rdatasets Archive
text: package supports three output formats can set globally: format setting applies functions return data (rddata(), rdindex(), rdsearch()).

title: Download and Read Datasets from Rdatasets — rddata
text: Downloads dataset Rdatasets archive returns data frame. https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/Rdatasets/

title: Download and Read Datasets from Rdatasets — rddata
Download and Read Datasets from Rdatasets — rddata
text: dataset String. Name dataset download Rdatasets archive. Use rdsearch() search available datasets. package String. Package name originally published data. NULL, function attempt automatically detect package searching exact match Rdatasets index.

title: Download and Read Datasets from Rdatasets — rddata
text: data frame containing dataset.

title: Download and Read Datasets from Rdatasets — rddata
text: nanoparquet package installed, rddata() use Parquet format, faster uses less bandwidth download. nanoparquet available, function automatically falls back CSV format using base R functionality.

title: Download and Read Datasets from Rdatasets — rddata
text: following global options control package behavior: Rdatasets_cache: Logical Whether cache downloaded data index faster subsequent access. Default: TRUE. Please keep option TRUE makes repeated access faster avoids overloading Rdatasets server. set FALSE local memory severely limited. Ex: `options(Rdatasets_cache = TRUE)“ Rdatasets_format: String Output format returned data. One "data.frame" (default), "tibble", "data.table". Default: "data.frame". Requires respective packages installed "tibble" "data.table" formats. Ex: options(Rdatasets_format = "tibble") Rdataset_path: String. Base URL Rdatasets archive. Default: "https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/Rdatasets/". Advanced users can set use different mirror local copy. Ex: options(Rdataset_path = "https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/Rdatasets/")

title: Search Available Datasets — rdsearch
text: pattern String. Search pattern. Can regular expression literal string depending fixed argument. field String. field search . One "package", "dataset", "title". NULL (default), searches three fields. fixed logical.  TRUE, pattern string     matched .  Overrides conflicting arguments. perl logical.  Perl-compatible regexps used? ignore.case FALSE, pattern matching case       sensitive TRUE, case ignored matching.
